snippet: In emerging markets, where political connections are often the path to wealth, Wall Street deal makers will want to make friends with government leaders.
abstract: In emerging markets, where political connections are often the path to wealth, Wall Street deal makers will want to make friends with government leaders.

headline.main: To Do Deals, Nothing Helps Like  Friends in High Places
headline.print_headline: Deal Professor: To Do Deals, Nothing Helps Like Friends in High Places
